${ModID}:Energize.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.
${ModID}:Energize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Increase this card's cost by 1 this combat.

${ModID}:Thunderbolt.NAME: Thunderbolt
${ModID}:Thunderbolt.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BurningStudy.NAME: Burning Study
${ModID}:BurningStudy.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cryostasis.NAME: Cryostasis
${ModID}:Cryostasis.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Darkleech.NAME: Darkleech
${ModID}:Darkleech.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Darkleech.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ALL enemies lose !M! HP. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AdventureGameSolution.NAME: Point and Click
${ModID}:AdventureGameSolution.DESCRIPTION: Add a ${ModID}:Fish, an *Insight, and a *Miracle into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:AdventureGameSolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a ${ModID}:Fish, an *Insight, and !M! *Miracles into your hand. NL Exhaust.
